content: Investments Savings Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Feb 2019Where can i park my money which gives me the highest form of return with high liquidity for me to re-enter the market when it is back in the downtrend?Just exited the stock market(80%) and got a decent profit. Have about 300k+ in cash now and i wish to leave it in highly liquid accounts with decent interest returns.Have currently Maxed the benefits in UOB One(75k@2.44%), CIMB Fastsaver(50k@1%), Rest park in poems mmf(1.14%). Anyone have any knowledge where else can i get a better return on my money? Am looking to shift the funds in fastsaver and poems mmf to a better return account.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Citi Maxigain got step up interest plus 70% SIBOR rate. Can get 2.43% after 1 year of step up.https://www.citibank.com.sg/gcb/deposits/mxgn-savacc.htm3 comments0

See all 3 comments Jonathan Chia Guangrong23 Feb 2019Only bonus interest is applicable if the minimum threshold of 70k is not met. Bonus interest starts from 0.1% and steps up by 0.1% to max 1.2% if current lowest balance is higher than previous month's lowest balance. The base interest is actually 70% of 1 month moving SIBOR and not strictly 1% per se. Cap of 150k account size after which interest of 0.05% will be applicable Question Poster26 Feb 2019Noted. Thank you for your help! will open an account soon
